constraints.name: path_constraint
constraints.description: 从起点到终点的路径长度必须恰好为 t 步

constraints.name: adjacency_relation
constraints.description: 每一步只能移动到相邻的格点（上、下、左、右）
constraints.formal: next_point in {up, down, left, right} of current_point

constraints.name: boundary_constraint
constraints.description: 所有移动必须在网格范围内进行，即坐标不能超出 (0, 0) 到 (n, n) 的范围
constraints.formal: 0 <= x, y <= n for all points (x, y) in path
